item.title: Power BI Developer - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Power BI Developer to join our team. As a Power BI Developer, you will be responsible for creating and managing business intelligence dashboards and reports using Power BI. You will collaborate closely with stakeholders to gather requirements and design visually appealing and interactive data visualizations. The ideal candidate should have strong experience in data modeling, ETL processes, and SQL. Proficiency in DAX and Power Query is a must. Attention to detail, problem-solving skills, and the ability to work independently are key for success in this role.

Skills required:
- Power BI
- Data modeling
- ETL processes
- SQL
- DAX
- Power Query

Hourly Range: $20.00-$45.00
Posted On: August 07, 2024 06:40 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Business Intelligence
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Business Intelligence
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Power Platform Developer - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a Power Platform Expert to develop, design, and manage solutions for our clients.

As a Power Platform Solution Architect/Developer, you will be instrumental in developing, deploying, and managing solutions using the Microsoft Power Platform suite (Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, and Power Virtual Agents) to drive efficiency and innovation for our clients. You will work closely with our clients’business stakeholders to understand their needs, design customized solutions, and ensure seamless integration with our existing systems.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with business units to identify process improvement opportunities and translate business requirements into technical solutions.
- Design and develop end-to-end solutions using Power Apps (Canvas and Model-driven), Power Automate, Power BI, and Power Virtual Agents.
- Architect scalable and maintainable solutions that adhere to best practices and organizational standards.
- Ensure seamless integration of Power Platform solutions with other Microsoft services like Dynamics 365, Azure, and Microsoft 365, as well as third-party applications.
- Lead the full lifecycle of solution development from concept through deployment and support.
- Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior developers and team members.
- Stay abreast of the latest Power Platform features and capabilities to drive continuous improvement and innovation within the organization.
- Conduct workshops and training sessions to promote the adoption of Power Platform solutions across the organization.
- Manage solution governance, including security, data privacy, and compliance requirements.

Qualifications:
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, or a related field.
- Proven experience as a Power Platform Developer or Architect, with a strong portfolio of developed solutions.
- Deep understanding of the Microsoft Power Platform and its components, including Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, and Power Virtual Agents.
- Experience with Microsoft Dynamics 365 and Azure services integration.
- Strong knowledge of common data service, data modeling, and data analysis techniques.
- Proficiency in related technologies, including SQL, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
- Excellent problem-solving, analytical, and project management skills.
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.


Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00
Posted On: August 07, 2024 04:39 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Microsoft Power Automate, Microsoft Power Automate Administration, Microsoft PowerApps, Microsoft Power BI
Skills: Microsoft Power Automate, Microsoft Power Automate Administration, Microsoft PowerApps, Microsoft Power BI
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Build dinamic financial kpis dashboard - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced Financial Dashboard and KPI Expert to join our team. This role involves developing, designing, and maintaining interactive financial dashboards that provide deep insights into our clients' financial health, creating and tracking key performance indicators (KPIs) to monitor and evaluate financial performance, and conducting monthly reviews and consultations to assess results and progress towards objectives. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in finance and data visualization, proficiency in financial software and tools like Power BI, Tableau, and Excel, and excellent analytical, communication, and presentation skills. If you are a financial expert with a passion for data visualization and providing meaningful insights to clients, we would love to hear from you.

item.title: PowerBI Dashboard Setup and Microsoft Fabric Evaluation - Upwork
item.description:
*Immediate Availability Required*

We are seeking a skilled professional to set up PowerBI with an on-premise SQL server to create a dynamic dashboard for our organization. The main focus of this project is to evaluate Microsoft Fabric and its integration with PowerBI. The ideal candidate will have experience in both PowerBI and on-premise SQL server configuration, and possess a strong understanding of Microsoft Fabric. This individual will be responsible for setting up the necessary connections, creating visually appealing dashboards, and ensuring data accuracy. Skills required for this job include:

- PowerBI
- On-premise SQL server
- Microsoft Fabric integration
- Data analysis
- Dashboard design

Gateway server is setup and configured already.

This is a medium-sized project with an estimated duration of up to two weeks. We are looking for an expert in the field who can effectively deliver results.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$62.00
Posted On: August 06, 2024 23:20 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Business Intelligence, Data Analysis
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Business Intelligence, Data Analysis
Country: United States

item.title: API Integration Expert  - Upwork
item.description:
I am needing someone to help me build out an API integration using Clickup's API. We need this API to pull designated lists out of Clickup and post them into a azure database / fabric datalake. Ideally we would use kubernetes / containers to run an application to transform the data coming out of the API from its bronze state to a silver state. This API needs to be dynamic and easily modifiable due to lists and fields in Clickup being modified
overtime. I am currently using python connect to Clickup's API. The issue is, the data that comes out includes all formatting and is not usable data. I need help transforming the data into usable information that can be analyzed / visualized inside of Power BI. I am open to using software outside of Python to get the data out of the API. This API has been challenging to navigate around and I could use help and teaching through the whole ETL process around this API. I have attached a file to show what the raw data looks like when pulling a list out of Clickup. In this file you will see how the information coming through it is not usable. Depending on the field being a text, formula, dropdown, or custom column, the formatting is different. I need help building something to extract the actual values out and ignore all the unnecessary formatting.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$100.00
Posted On: August 06, 2024 21:45 UTC
Category: Back-End Development
Skills:Azure DevOps, Kubernetes, API, API Integration, API Development, RESTful API, Python, Database, Microsoft Power BI
Skills: Azure DevOps, Kubernetes, API, API Integration, API Development, RESTful API, Python, Database, Microsoft Power BI
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Municipal property analysis - Upwork
item.description:
I am exploring a housing initiative, and am currently in the phase of costing the work by way of a pilot initiative.

Pilot municipality: Sarnia, ON

Inventory of properties that meet the following criteria:
- zoned for low-density residential
- minimum lot width and area in accordance with zoning by-law.

Inventory of 90% of largest properties zoned low-density residential, highlighting properties that have:
- smallest width
- smallest area
- irregular shape

Properties which fall into both inventories to be highlighted.

Shape files that can be provided back to municipality for easy identification of inventoried properties.

Category: Data Visualization

item.title: Power BI Development - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced Power BI developer to create a comprehensive executive dashboard. This dashboard will consolidate data from Procore, Excel, and other sources, providing real-time insights into multiple projects and departments.

Project Overview:

Objective: Develop a Power BI dashboard that integrates data from Procore, Microsoft Excel, and other data sources to provide an executive-level overview of all projects and departments.
Scope:
Data Integration: Pull data from Procore, Excel spreadsheets, and possibly other sources.
Dashboard Design: Create a visually appealing and user-friendly dashboard tailored to our specific needs.
Real-Time Updates: Ensure the dashboard updates automatically with the latest data.
Custom Views: Develop different views and reports for project status, departmental overviews, financials, and timelines.
Collaboration: Enable easy sharing and access for team members.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$30.00
Posted On: August 06, 2024 19:06 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI

Country: United States

item.title: Data Analyst - Upwork
item.description:
A boutique consulting firm based in Milan and New York that specializes in delivering strategic and operational solutions to community-based  financial institutions, including credit unions, community development financial institutions (CDFIs) in the US, and smaller financial institutions in Italy.

Job Description:
We are seeking a meticulous and motivated Part-Time Data Analyst to (a)  help support the final stages of report creation and (b) help us evaluate the financial landscape of community-based financial institutions in Italy.  The successful candidate will be responsible for analyzing data, generating insights, and supporting our consultants with data-driven decision-making tailored to small financial institutions.

Key Responsibilities:

Data Analysis -

Cartographic or Geo-based Analysis

Develop and maintain dashboards and reports to visualize key metrics

Conduct statistical analysis to identify patterns, correlations, and insights (a plus)

Collaborate with consultants to understand project requirements and deliver data solutions.

Assist in preparing presentations and reports for client meetings, highlighting data-driven insights and recommendations.

Ensure data integrity and accuracy in all analyses, with a focus on financial data.

Stay updated with the latest data analysis tools and techniques, especially those relevant to the financial sector.

Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Statistics, Economics, Finance, Computer Science, or a related field.

Proven experience as a Data Analyst or in a similar role, preferably within the financial sector.
Proficiency in data analysis tools such as Excel, SQL, Python, or R.

Experience with data visualization tools such as Excel, Tableau, Power BI, or similar.

Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex financial data sets.

Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to present findings clearly.

Ability to work independently and manage time effectively within a part-time schedule.
Detail-oriented with a strong commitment to accuracy.

Familiarity with the financial sector, particularly with credit unions, CDFIs in the US, and smaller financial institutions in Italy, is highly desirable.

Work Hours:

Part-time position with a commitment of no more than 10 hours per week.

Flexible schedule with the ability to coordinate with teams in Milan and New York.

We look forward to reviewing your application.

Hourly Range: $12.00-$22.00
Posted On: August 06, 2024 18:46 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Growth Analytics, Report, Data Analysis Consultation, Dashboard, Analytical Presentation, Microsoft Excel, Data Science, Google Analytics, Statistics, Data Entry
Skills: Growth Analytics, Report, Data Analysis Consultation, Dashboard, Analytical Presentation, Microsoft Excel, Data Science, Google Analytics, Statistics, Data Entry
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Data Analyst - Upwork
item.description:
Firm Mission Statement 

Our mission is to change as many lives as possible by offering immigration solutions even in the most difficult cases. We look at all possible options to keep our clients in the United States with their families where they belong. We stand ready to fight even when success seems unsure because we understand how much better life can be with the dignity and peace of mind that comes with having documents.â€¯ â€¯ 

 

Position Purpose 

We are seeking a detail-oriented Data Analyst of Operations to drive performance improvement through strategic data analysis and visualization. Responsibilities include developing KPIs for value streams, managing operational data sources, and creating data visualizations to inform and guide operational decisions. The role involves partnering closely with leadership to identify gaps, recommend solutions, and establish SOPs for effective data measurement and reporting. Ideal candidates will excel in problem-solving, have a strong analytical mindset, and possess the ability to collaborate across teams to optimize operational efficiency. 

 

Essential Job Functions & Responsibilities 

Create key performance indicators (KPIs) to help measure the health and performance of the various value streams, and cascade them downwards so they are measured and visible and a team level 

Create and manage various operational data sources such as demand forecasts, capacity planning tools, production schedules, run charts, etc. 

Partner with operational leadership to problem solve or recommend actions based on data analysis 

Create data visualizations through report and dashboard generation so that operational leadership can be quickly informed on measurable activities 

Identify data gaps which must be closed using manual processes, and partner with our IT team to integrate these solutions into our systems 

Partner with our project management team to help them identify where there are needs for problem solving or operational efficiency gains to meet business needs 

Develop standard operating procedures (SOPs) where they do not exist so that best practices for measuring and visualizing data and metrics are documented 

 

Essential Skills, Knowledge & Abilities 

Proven experience creating and owning dashboards with user-based and event-based data 

Ability to research and synthesize data insights and recommendations to stakeholders 

Ability to prioritize across multiple teams and projects 

Knowledge or experience in Salesforce tools for reports and dashboards is a plus 

Advanced knowledge of Excel and experience with data analysis tools (e.g. SQL, Tableau, Power BI) 

Strong organizational and time-management skills 

Ability to convey complex information clearly and concisely to various stakeholders 

 
Minimum Qualifications 

Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Operations Management, or a related field 

3+ years of experience in data analysis or business analysis in a production or operational based environment 

Hourly Range: $8.00
Posted On: August 06, 2024 18:12 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Operations Analytics, Microsoft Power BI, Tableau, Microsoft Excel, Data Entry, Python, Data Visualization, Statistics, Data Science, SQL
Skills: Operations Analytics, Microsoft Power BI, Tableau, Microsoft Excel, Data Entry, Python, Data Visualization, Statistics, Data Science, SQL
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Power BI Expert Needed to Build Management Decision Dashboard - Upwork
item.description:
Description:

We are seeking an experienced Power BI expert to create a comprehensive and interactive dashboard using our provided dataset. The primary users of this dashboard are high-level management who will utilize it for making decisions related to employee promotions and performance reviews.

Key Requirements:

User Experience and Design:
The dashboard must be highly intuitive and user-friendly for top management.
Design with a clean, professional aesthetic suitable for executive use.
Strong emphasis on design and user experience to ensure ease of use and visual appeal.
Dashboard Pages:

Page 1: Promotions Overview
Total Employees vs. Promotions:
Chart showing total number of employees versus those eligible for promotion.
Include an interactive target indicator highlighting if the number exceeds 20%, with a color-coded warning.

Gender and Nationality Breakdown:
Two callout charts: one showing promotion eligibility by gender and another by nationality.
Assignment Status:
Chart displaying promotion eligibility by assignment status (In Business Line, Outside of Business Line, Permanent).

Years in Grade:
Chart showing distribution of years in the current grade.
Drill-through Feature:
Each chart should allow drill-through to detailed data by Admin Area.

Employee Profile Section Page:
Right-side panel: Shows the selected employee's profile with their information, including Badge, Name, Grade Code, PMP ratings for the past 5 years, Employee Type, and Assignment Status.
Left-side panel: Displays a table listing employees with their Badge Number, Name, and Grade Code.
Bottom table: Shows profiles of employees who have the same hire date as the selected employee. This table includes their profile data to compare who is likely to get promoted or receive a high PMP rating.

Page 2: Performance Review Overview

PMP Breakdown:
Key charts breaking down employees by PMP type (S, E+, E, M, D).

Callout for High Performers:
Callout showing total employees versus those who receive S and E+, with a target of 25%.

Employee Type Analysis:
Chart showing the breakdown of S and E+ ratings by Employee Type (Management vs. Regular).
Create a measure to show the percentage of Management and Regular employees receiving S or E+.
Management should constitute 60% of the 25% target, and Regular should constitute 40%.
Color-coded indicators to show if targets are exceeded.

Deliverables:
Completed Power BI dashboard with all the specified features.
A recorded session or live demonstration showing how the dashboard was created and how to use it.

Deadline:
This project is urgent and needs to be completed as soon as possible. Please specify your fastest delivery time.

Skills Required:
Expertise in Power BI and data visualization.
Experience with creating dashboards for executive use.
Strong understanding of HR metrics and performance review processes.
Excellent design and user experience skills to ensure the dashboard is both functional and visually appealing.

How to Apply:
Provide examples of previous Power BI dashboards you have created, preferably for executive or management use.
Outline your approach to creating this dashboard and your estimated timeline for completion.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$62.00
Posted On: August 06, 2024 16:57 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Dashboard, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Business Intelligence
Skills: Dashboard, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Business Intelligence
Country: Saudi Arabia
click to apply

item.title: Supply Chain Research and Development Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are seeking a dynamic and detail-oriented Supply Chain Research and Development Specialist to join our team. This position is crucial in shaping our product development strategy, ensuring we remain competitive and innovative in the market. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in garment/clothing/apparel, with additional expertise in accessories, packaging, and other related products.
Key Responsibilities:
Market Research & Analysis: Conduct thorough market research to identify emerging trends, consumer preferences, and potential market gaps in the garment, accessories, and packaging sectors.
Competitor Analysis: Analyze competitors' products, pricing, and market positioning to provide actionable insights and strategic recommendations.
Product Development: Collaborate with sourcing experts, designers, and marketing teams to conceptualize and develop new product ideas that align with market demands and company goals.
Feasibility Studies: Evaluate the feasibility of new product ideas, including cost analysis, resource availability, and potential ROI.
Trend Monitoring: Stay up-to-date with industry trends, technological advancements, and regulatory changes affecting the supply chain and product development processes.
Data Analysis & Reporting: Analyze data from various sources to generate insights and reports that support strategic decision-making.
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with sourcing, design, and marketing teams to ensure seamless integration of product development initiatives into the overall business strategy.

Qualifications:
Education: Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain Management, Business, Marketing, or a related field. Advanced degrees or certifications in relevant areas are a plus.
Experience: Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in supply chain, research and development, market research, or a related field. Experience in the garment/clothing/apparel industry is highly desirable.

Skills & Tools:
Analytical Tools: Proficiency in data analysis software such as Excel, Google sheets, SPSS, Tableau, Power BI or other similar softwares.
Social Listening & Brand Monitoring Tools: Familiarity with tools like Brandwatch, Brand24, Hootsuite, or Sprout Social for monitoring brand reputation and consumer sentiment or other similar tools.
Project Management Tools: Familiarity with project management tools like Asana, Trello, or Monday.com.
Communication & Collaboration Tools: Proficient in using communication platforms like Slack, Microsoft Teams, and Zoom.
Market Research Tools: Experience with market research platforms like Google Analytics, Shopify Analytics, SurveyMonkey, SEMrush, Nielsen, Euromonitor, Mintel or other similar tools.
Design & Prototyping Tools: Basic knowledge of design tools like Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop) and prototyping software (Sketch, Figma) is a plus.
ERP & Supply Chain Software: Exposure with ERP systems like Inventory Planner, Inventory, CIN7, Stocky and other similar systems.


Hourly Range: $8.00-$10.00
Posted On: August 06, 2024 11:20 UTC

item.content:encoded:
Job Description:
We are seeking a dynamic and detail-oriented Supply Chain Research and Development Specialist to join our team. This position is crucial in shaping our product development strategy, ensuring we remain competitive and innovative in the market. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in garment/clothing/apparel, with additional expertise in accessories, packaging, and other related products.
Key Responsibilities:
Market Research & Analysis: Conduct thorough market research to identify emerging trends, consumer preferences, and potential market gaps in the garment, accessories, and packaging sectors.
Competitor Analysis: Analyze competitors' products, pricing, and market positioning to provide actionable insights and strategic recommendations.
Product Development: Collaborate with sourcing experts, designers, and marketing teams to conceptualize and develop new product ideas that align with market demands and company goals.
Feasibility Studies: Evaluate the feasibility of new product ideas, including cost analysis, resource availability, and potential ROI.
Trend Monitoring: Stay up-to-date with industry trends, technological advancements, and regulatory changes affecting the supply chain and product development processes.
Data Analysis & Reporting: Analyze data from various sources to generate insights and reports that support strategic decision-making.
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with sourcing, design, and marketing teams to ensure seamless integration of product development initiatives into the overall business strategy.

Qualifications:
Education: Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain Management, Business, Marketing, or a related field. Advanced degrees or certifications in relevant areas are a plus.
Experience: Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in supply chain, research and development, market research, or a related field. Experience in the garment/clothing/apparel industry is highly desirable.

Skills & Tools:
Analytical Tools: Proficiency in data analysis software such as Excel, Google sheets, SPSS, Tableau, Power BI or other similar softwares.
Social Listening & Brand Monitoring Tools: Familiarity with tools like Brandwatch, Brand24, Hootsuite, or Sprout Social for monitoring brand reputation and consumer sentiment or other similar tools.
Project Management Tools: Familiarity with project management tools like Asana, Trello, or Monday.com.
Communication & Collaboration Tools: Proficient in using communication platforms like Slack, Microsoft Teams, and Zoom.
Market Research Tools: Experience with market research platforms like Google Analytics, Shopify Analytics, SurveyMonkey, SEMrush, Nielsen, Euromonitor, Mintel or other similar tools.
Design & Prototyping Tools: Basic knowledge of design tools like Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop) and prototyping software (Sketch, Figma) is a plus.
ERP & Supply Chain Software: Exposure with ERP systems like Inventory Planner, Inventory, CIN7, Stocky and other similar systems.


Hourly Range: $8.00-$10.00
Posted On: August 06, 2024 11:20 UTC
Category: Logistics & Supply Chain Management
Skills:Supply Chain Management
Skills: Supply Chain Management

item.title: Proactive Data Analyst for Youth Activity Centers Projects | Make a real impact with us! - Upwork
item.description:
Are you the A player we're looking for?

If you thrive on making a real impact and improving business processes, we'd love to connect!

We're a growing Automation Agency looking for a proactive, detail-oriented Data Analyst who wants to work with well-organized data to create impactful reports and dashboards for our clients.

This role is ideal for someone who enjoys applying their skills to real-world business processes and wants to grow in a dynamic industry.

Our projects focus on automating core business processes for Youth Activity Centers—such as dance, music, and acting schools—by integrating their tech stack and maximizing its potential.

Unlike larger companies where processes are rigid and data quality often suffers, we work closely with our clients to ensure their data is clean, well-organized, and stored properly.



What You'll Do:

-Create and maintain reports and dashboards to provide actionable insights for our clients.
-Audit existing data and systems to ensure accuracy and consistency.
-Offer insights on how to enhance data processes and improve data quality.
-Collaborate with our team to brainstorm innovative solutions and share knowledge.


What We Offer:

-Training and Frameworks: You’ll receive all the necessary resources and training to understand how to implement the client's project.
-Growth Opportunities: We’re looking for exceptional people to grow with us. If we’re a good fit, there’s potential for long-term collaboration.
-Quality Data: Work with well-organized, clean data and have the opportunity to improve client processes.


About You:

-You hate inefficiency and are excited about the growing Automation field.
-Enthusiastic about activities like music, dance, or sports.
-Based in Europe, to ensure smooth team coordination.
-Familiar with data sources like CRM systems and spreadsheets.
-Proficient with tools like Power BI and Google Data Studio.
-Proficient with SQL language.


Ready to make a difference and grow in the Automation industry?

Apply now! Start your cover letter with the word “acciuga” and tell us why you're passionate about data analysis. Share a project you enjoyed and explain why you think you're a great fit for our team.




Posted On: August 06, 2024 11:08 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:SQL, Microsoft Power BI, Operations Analytics, Marketing Analytics, Sales Analytics, Dashboard, Query Development, Report, Microsoft Excel, Data Analysis
Skills: SQL, Microsoft Power BI, Operations Analytics, Marketing Analytics, Sales Analytics, Dashboard, Query Development, Report, Microsoft Excel, Data Analysis
Country: Spain

item.title: Planning Engineer & Project Scheduling Assistant - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and motivated Planning Engineer & Project Scheduling Assistant to join our team for various technology integration projects. This is an excellent opportunity for a professional with strong scheduling skills, data visualization expertise, and a background in project management to gain hands-on experience and mentorship from a seasoned global consultant.

Responsibilities:
• Priority: Demonstrable experience with MSProject, Primavera, and Power BI. Develop detailed program/project schedules using MSProject and Primavera. (Data Visualization)
• Work Breakdown Structures (WBS): Create comprehensive WBS, task lists, and Workstream Boards using Excel.
• Data Visualization: Utilize Power BI for project data analysis and visualization, ensuring clear communication of project metrics.
• Task Management: Establish task dependencies, allocate resources, and estimate durations effectively.
• Project Coordination: Collaborate with the project management team to ensure alignment with overall project goals.
• Milestone Management: Set up and manage project milestones and critical paths for successful project delivery.
• Risk Management: Assist in implementing risk management strategies and performance metrics.
• Documentation and Reporting: Provide administrative support, including documentation and reporting for project tracking.
• Advanced Scheduling: Support the owner in advanced scheduling, planning, and initiatives, including delay/schedule analysis.

Requirements:
• Technical Proficiency: Demonstrated expertise in using MSProject, Primavera, and Power BI, with examples of past projects.
• Analytical Skills: Strong analytical skills for project scheduling, resource allocation, and data visualization.
• Proficiency in Spreadsheets: Skilled in using Excel or Google Sheets for data management and reporting.
• Organizational Skills: Strong organizational and communication skills, with attention to detail.
• Independent Worker: Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
• Eager Learner: Enthusiastic and eager to learn, with a proactive attitude toward problem-solving.



Preferred Qualifications:
• Engineering Background: Bachelor's degree in engineering or a related field, with either education or demonstrable work experience in project scheduling and management.
• Project Management Experience: Experience in project scheduling, resource allocation, and risk management.
• Bilingual: Proficiency in English and another language is a plus.
• Immediate Availability: Prefer candidates who can join immediately and have transferable skills or experience.

About Us:
We are a rapidly growing IT MSP company specializing in complex technology integrations. Our team is dedicated to delivering high-quality solutions and exceeding client expectations. This role presents an exciting opportunity to work on significant projects with major clients, providing valuable experience in the field of project scheduling and management.




Posted On: August 06, 2024 10:33 UTC
Category: Development & IT Project Management
Skills:Data Migration, Business Application Maintenance, Computer Maintenance, Project Scheduling, Scheduling, Project Management
Skills: Data Migration, Business Application Maintenance, Computer Maintenance, Project Scheduling, Scheduling, Project Management
Country: Canada
click to apply
